website_summaries.verdict: For users without a lot of space in their work area, this compact model saves desk space without sacrificing a lot of visibility or picture quality.
pros: 1080p picture quality looks crisp and clear on the 20" screen, making text and images easily visible despite the smaller screen size
Includes ports for connecting through VGA or DVI-D cables
Of course, the primary benefit of this model is its ability to fit into small spaces
Compact frame accomplishes that for users with limited space while still providing a clear display for work sessions
cons: This model doesn't include an HDMI input
